title: [Medicine] A study on almost 4000 people of African descent has identified a gene that acts as natural defense against HIV by limiting its replication in certain white blood cells. The findings provide insights into potential therapeutic targets, which are needed to continue the fight against HIV-1.

[Medicine] A beneficial gut bacteria residing in the human gut microbiome, which normally cannot survive in an environment with oxygen, can now be made oxygen-tolerant. This is being used in the development of probiotic treatments to improve glucose control in individuals with prediabetes.
